p: Cibenza IDN900 or NovoProD were dissolved in water with continuous steering overnight to a stock solution of 2%. The enzyme solution and de-ionized water were added to the bottles, resulting in enzyme concentrations of 0, 0.5, and 1.0% (w enzyme/w feather). The bottles were continuously agitated in a shaker (INFORS HT Ecotron, Infors AG, Bottmingen, Switzerland) at 55°C with 100 rpm for 60 min, before heating or autoclaving.
